mainText:
It was great shock and deeply sad news.
my condolences to Steve's family, friend and all the people who loved Steve.

Never had chance to meet him personally but his life really was influencing
to my growth.
It was great joy to watch how Steve drastically change his destinies and I
truly loved his creative products as customer.
One of most inspiring, motivating person to my life and I always dreamed
about the courage and passion he had.
Learned a lot from you, Steve. Thank you very much and you will be missed.
author: David
